column3: I was spoiled on some really amazing places
column4: even a few which were just screened-in shacks. Smoque elevates BBQ to a different level; not better per se
column5: but more of an element of style. I do wish they'd vary the menu up a bit
column6: to include the mac-daddy of all bbq meats
column9: I'll settle on the pulled pork. Adding a "taste" to your plate is always a bonus. There's some competition with Big Bricks
column10: County BBQ (which is close to work)
column11: and my own fine slow-cooked ribs
